data.name: MsgConvertAllFilesToHTML
data.value: More than one were dragged & dropped.\nDo you wish to convert all files to HTML files on this options?
data.comment: Form1 - ダイアログメッセージ

data.name: MsgErrorDeleteTemporaryFile
data.value:
Error during deleting temporary file!
a temporary file may be left in the folder the file is edited.
This file is not a problem even if you delete it manually.
data.comment: Form1 - ダイアログメッセージ

data.name: MsgFindCompleteToBeginning
data.value: Searching completed to the beginning of this file\nDo you wish to continue searching from the end of this file?
data.comment: Form1 - ダイアログメッセージ

data.name: MsgFindCompleteToEnd
data.value: Searching completed to the end of this file\nDo you wish to continue searching from the beginning of this file?
data.comment: Form1 - ダイアログメッセージ

data.name: MsgNoHelpFile
data.value: Could not find Help file.\nOpening this file has failed.
data.comment: Form1 - ダイアログメッセージ

data.comment: Form1 - ダイアログメッセージ

data.name: MsgNotFound
data.comment: Form1 - ダイアログメッセージ

data.name: MsgNotFoundToBeginning
data.value: The word could not find to the beginning of this file.\nDo you wish to continue searching from the end of this file?
data.comment: Form1 - ダイアログメッセージ

data.name: MsgNotFoundToEnd
data.value: The word could not find the word to the end of this file.\nDo you wish to continue searching from the beginning of this file?
data.comment: Form1 - ダイアログメッセージ

data.name: MsgOpenAllFiles
data.value: More than one were read.\nDo you wish to convert all files to HTML files on this options?\nif you select 'No', all files will be opend without converting.
